title: Cannot login to comment on Nexus and ESports
body:
Firstly I couldn't login to comment on ESports. "Login to comment" throws me to login form then redirects to previous page but I still cannot post comments.
I thought that only NA players can comment on ESports or smth and forgot about it.
Today I noticed same thing with Nexus.

Looks like login doesn't work on some (or all) subdomains.

replies.body: It sounds like you may have a caching or browser issue that's not getting you to where you need to login.  Try [clearing your cache ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)as your first step, or run in incognito in case of any extension issues.  Hope that helps!

Thanks for your concern.

I cleared all cached files.
I deleted all cookies containing "riot" and "league".
I removed all localStorage records.
Ctrl+F5 nexus page.

Tried in "New incognito window".

Still simptoms are the same. With following steps taken:
1. I navigate to Nexus
2. Click on "XX comments" button to expand comments
3. Click on "LOG IN TO COMMENT"
4. Enter sign-in information (ignoring autofill and remembered password)
5. Navigate to Nexus again
6. Expand comments
7. See that you still cannot comment ("log in to comment" appears instead of input textarea).
If I press "login to comment" this time -> I will be redirected to authorization form and then immediately (without entering credentials second time) -> redirected to nexus with no possibility to comment again
